title: Part C

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: If a student mentions obtaining the magnitude of a off the graph and using Newton’s second law both in linear and rotational form to obtain an equation for I, whereas the object rolls without slipping, such that I= R 2 ( mg a −m−M ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4495@ , then all 4 points are earned.
